title: Creating an Equation
text: The small angles of a right triangle add to $$90$$. $$x+y=90$$. From the problem, we also know that $$x-3y=26$$.

title: Elimination
text: We can multiply the first equation by $$3$$ to get $$3x+3y=270$$. Now, we add the equations to eliminate $$y$$. $$4x=296$$

title: Solving for X, Y
text: $$x=\frac{296}{4}=74$$. Plugging $$x$$ back into the equation, we get $$y=90-74=16$$.
